author: KVS79
title: Surprising Hotel -
text:
You will realise from the minute you arrive that you are in for some surprises at this hotel. The collection of art starts outside and carries on inside, get a member of staff to give you a tour. The rooms are clean and very modern in a true 5 star hotel. Breakfast was just OK and several people had issues sorted with difficulty. Afternoon tea was good. English speaking staff on reception. Away from the main tourist area this is in CBD so taxi or subway to tourist areas. Exclusive shopping mall is joined to the hotel for those expensive luxury items.
Room Tip: Recommend King size room on 16th floor. See more room tips
